snippet.title: Click to Go to Web Page
snippet.description: Clicking on the specified object loads the URL in a new browser window.

snippet.title: Custom Mouse Cursor
snippet.description: Replaces the default mouse cursor with the specified object on stage.

snippet.title: Drag and Drop
snippet.description: Makes the specified object moveable with drag and drop.

snippet.title: Play a Movie Clip
snippet.description: Plays the specified object or movie clip which is currently stopped on stage.

snippet.title: Stop a Movie Clip
snippet.description: Stops the specified object or movie clip currently playing on stage.

snippet.title: Click to Hide an Object
snippet.description: Clicking the specified object hides it.

snippet.title: Show an Object
snippet.description: Makes the specified object visible.

snippet.title: Click to Position an Object
snippet.description: Moves the specified object to the x and y coordinates you specify.

snippet.title: Click to Display a TextField
snippet.description: Clicking on the specified object creates and displays a TextField at a position you specify.

snippet.title: Generate a Random Number
snippet.description: Generates a random number value between 0 and a number you specify.

snippet.title: Bring Object to the Front
snippet.description: Brings any clicked object to the front.

snippet.title: Simple Timer
snippet.description: Displays a timer in the Output panel, which counts down a duration you specify.

snippet.title: Countdown Timer
snippet.description: Counts down from a duration you specify.

snippet.title: Stop at this Frame
snippet.description: Stops the playhead from advancing to the next frame in the Timeline.

snippet.title: Click to Go to Frame and Stop
snippet.description: Clicking the object moves the playhead to the specified frame and stops.

snippet.title: Click to Go to Frame and Play
snippet.description: Clicking the object moves the playhead to the specified frame and continues playing.

snippet.title: Click to Go to Next Frame and Stop
snippet.description: Clicking the object moves the playhead to the next frame and stops.

snippet.title: Click to Go to Previous Frame and Stop
snippet.description: Clicking the object moves the playhead to the previous frame and stops.

snippet.title: Click to Go to Next Scene and Play
snippet.description: Clicking the object moves the playhead to the next scene and continues playing.

snippet.title: Click to Go to Previous Scene and Play
snippet.description: Clicking the object moves the playhead to the previous scene and continues playing.

snippet.title: Click to Go to Scene and Play
snippet.description: Clicking the object plays the movie from the specified scene and frame.

category.title: Animation
category.description: Code to change an object's properties over time

snippet.title: Move with Keyboard Arrows
snippet.description: Allows the object to be moved with the keyboard arrows.

snippet.title: Move Horizontally
snippet.description: Moves the specified object to the left or right by the specified number of pixels.

snippet.title: Move Vertically
snippet.description: Moves the specified object up or down a number of pixels you specify.

snippet.title: Rotate Once
snippet.description: Rotates the specified object one time in the direction you specify by updating the rotation property.

snippet.title: Rotate Continuously
snippet.description: Rotates the object continuously by updating its rotation property within an ENTER_FRAME event.

snippet.title: Animate Horizontally
snippet.description: Animates the specified object horizontally across the stage by updating the X property within the ENTER_FRAME event.

snippet.title: Animate Vertically
snippet.description: Animates the specified object vertically across the stage by updating the Y property within the ENTER_FRAME event.

snippet.title: Fade In a Movie Clip
snippet.description: Fades in the specified object by updating the alpha property within the ENTER_FRAME event.

snippet.title: Fade Out a Movie Clip
snippet.description: Fades out the specified object by updating the alpha property within the ENTER_FRAME event.

category.title: Load and Unload
category.description: Code to load and unload assets

snippet.title: Click to Load/Unload SWF or Image
snippet.description: Clicking the specified object loads a SWF or image URL. Clicking a second time unloads it.

snippet.title: Click to Load Image from Library
snippet.description: Clicking the specified object loads and displays an image from the Library.

snippet.title: Add Instance from Library
snippet.description: Adds an instance of the specified Library symbol to the stage.

snippet.title: Remove Instance from Stage
snippet.description: Removes the specified symbol instance from the stage.

snippet.title: Load External Text
snippet.description: Loads and displays a text file in the Output panel.

category.title: Audio and Video
category.description: Code for working with audio and video

snippet.title: Click to Play/Stop Sound
snippet.description: Clicking the specified object plays a sound. Clicking a second time stops playing it.

snippet.title: Click to Stop All Sounds
snippet.description: Clicking on the object stops all sounds currently playing.

snippet.title: On Cue Point Event
snippet.description: Assigns a function to be executed each time a cue point (any significant moment in time occurring within a video clip) is passed in the selected video.

snippet.title: Click to Play Video
snippet.description: Clicking the specified object plays a video inside an FLVPlayback component.

snippet.title: Click to Pause Video
snippet.description: Clicking the specified object pauses the video in an FLVPlayback component.

snippet.title: Click to Rewind Video
snippet.description: Clicking the specified object rewinds the video in an FLVPlayback component.

snippet.title: Click to Set Video Source
snippet.description: Clicking the specified object replaces the video in an FLVPlayback component.

snippet.title: Click to Seek to Cue Point
snippet.description: Clicking the specified object seeks to a cue point of the video in an FLVPlayback component.

snippet.title: Create a NetStream Video
snippet.description: Begins playing a video file without using the FLVPlayback component.

category.title: Event Handlers
category.description: Code to handle basic user input

snippet.title: Mouse Click Event
snippet.description: Clicking on the specified object executes a function containing your custom code.

snippet.title: Mouse Over Event
snippet.description: Mousing over the specified object executes a function containing your custom code.

snippet.title: Mouse Out Event
snippet.description: Mousing out of the object executes a function containing your custom code.

snippet.title: Key Pressed Event
snippet.description: Assigns a function to be executed each time a key is pressed.

snippet.title: Enter Frame Event
snippet.description: Assigns a function to be executed each time the playhead moves into a new frame.

category.title: Mobile Touch Events
category.description: Code to handle touch input in Mobile devices

snippet.title: Tap Event
snippet.description: Tapping on the specified object executes a function containing your custom code.

snippet.title: Touch and Drag Event
snippet.description: Allows the specified object to be moved by holding and dragging.

snippet.title: Long Press Event
snippet.description: Pressing the specified object for one second executes a function containing your custom code. This action can be used to display a menu for that object.

category.title: Mobile Gesture Events
category.description: Code to handle gesture input in Mobile devices

snippet.title: Two Finger Tap Event
snippet.description: Tapping the stage with two fingers executes a function containing your custom code.

snippet.title: Pinch to Zoom Event
snippet.description: Pinching the stage will zoom in on the selected object.

snippet.title: Pan Event
snippet.description: Pans the selected object on stage. The object to be panned is usually larger than the viewable area.

snippet.title: Rotate Event
snippet.description: Rotates the selected object, usually by moving two fingers clockwise or counter-clockwise.

snippet.title: Swipe Event
snippet.description: Swiping the stage executes a function containing your custom code. This event can be used to scroll text in a TextField or change states in your application.

category.title: Mobile Actions
category.description: Code for common interactions on Mobile devices

snippet.title: Swipe to Go to Next/Previous Frame and Stop
snippet.description: Swiping the stage moves the playhead to the next/previous frame in the Timeline and stops the playhead.

snippet.title: Swipe to Go to Next/Previous Scene and Play
snippet.description: Swiping the stage moves the playhead to the next/previous scene in the Timeline and continues playback in that scene.

snippet.title: Move with Accelerometer
snippet.description: Allows the object to be moved by tilting the mobile device.

snippet.title: Deactivate/Activate Event
snippet.description: Conserve CPU by suspending the application on Deactivate event and resuming the application on Activate event.

snippet.title: Menu Key Pressed Event
snippet.description: Executes your code when the device's Menu key is pressed.

category.title: AIR for Mobile
category.description: Code for common mobile actions available via AIR.

snippet.title: Show Geolocation
snippet.description: Show latitude and longitude in a TextField.

snippet.title: Re-orient Object on Device Rotation
snippet.description: Re-orient the specified object when device is rotated.

snippet.title: Click to Close AIR Window
snippet.description: Clicking on the specified object will exit the AIR application.

snippet.title: Click to Minimize AIR Window
snippet.description: Clicking on the specified object will minimize the AIR application.

snippet.title: Click to Maximize or Restore AIR Window
snippet.description: Clicking on the specified object will maximize the AIR application or restore the window to its previous size if it is already maximized.

snippet.title: Drag to Move AIR Window
snippet.description: Allows entire AIR application window to be moved by clicking and dragging on the specified object.

snippet.title: Click to Read from a Text File
snippet.description: Clicking on the specified object will prompt the user to select a file which will then be displayed in the output panel.

snippet.title: Click to Write to a Text File
snippet.description: Clicking on the specified object will prompt the user to select a location and file name and save a text string to it.

snippet.title: Save and Load Preferences
snippet.description: Saves data to local storage and loads it on next launch.
